actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce from 60 to 55 the age at which a woman may become entitled to actuarially reduced widow's insurance benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Reduces from 60 to 55 the age at which a woman may become entitled to actuarially reduced widow's insurance benefits, under title II (Old-Age Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce from 60 to 55 the age at which a woman may become entitled to actuarially reduced widow's insurance benefits thereunder.
